thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com
thread.title: Awesome Zizi

author: Awesome Zizi
title: Awesome Zizi
text: Purchased an expensive camcorder so I was concerned about shipping and return policy but everything went very smoothly...received the camera in record time and in perfect condition (I did not need to return it). The price was the best out there (it included FREE shipping and NO tax!) and I was able to use a coupon. All in all, I would definitely use Beachcamera again and HIGHLY recommend it to others!!
